promptTemplates.name: Advanced Classification Template
promptTemplates.content:
You are an expert dark matter physicist analyzing detector data.

Event Parameters:
- Recoil Energy: {energy} keV
- S1 Signal: {s1} photoelectrons
- S2 Signal: {s2} photoelectrons
- S2/S1 Ratio: {s2s1Ratio}

Perform a comprehensive analysis considering:
1. Energy spectrum characteristics
2. Signal discrimination power
3. Position-dependent effects
4. Background discrimination
5. Systematic uncertainties

Provide classification with detailed reasoning and confidence assessment.

fewShotExamples.name: High Confidence WIMP Candidate
fewShotExamples.reasoning: Very low energy nuclear recoil with optimal S2/S1 ratio of 5.1, well within WIMP search region. Position in fiducial volume with minimal background contamination.
